declare new integer n
read n from the user input
create new array of integers num with size n
declare new array of integers lock with n elements
start for loop from i = 1 to n inclusive incrementing i

read c from the input
change num [ i ] to c - ' 0 '

in a for loop , change i from 1 to n inclusive incrementing i

create new integer called sum with value 0
in a for loop , change i from 1 to n inclusive

lines.text: if num [ i ] is greater than lock [ i ]
add min ( abs ( num [ i ] - lock [ i ] ) , abs ( 9 - num [ i ] ) + 1 + lock [ i ] ) to sum
lines.code: sum += min ( abs ( num [ i ] - lock [ i ] ) , abs ( 9 - num [ i ] ) + 1 + lock [ i ] ) ;

lines.text: else
change sum to the sum of sum and min ( abs ( num [ i ] - lock [ i ] ) , abs ( 9 - lock [ i ] ) + 1 + num [ i ] )
lines.code: sum += min ( abs ( num [ i ] - lock [ i ] ) , abs ( 9 - lock [ i ] ) + 1 + num [ i ] ) ;

lines.text: DUMMY
